data.name: CFS  - Spring 2020 Reston Azure DataFest: Big Data & Analytics Conference
data.description:
Hello Everyone!
We are pleased to announce that registration is open for “Spring 2020 Reston Azure DataFest”, a 1-day event on Friday, April 17, 2020, 9:00AM to 5:00PM at the Microsoft offices at 12012 Sunset Hills Road, Reston,VA., 20190. We will be in Rooms 3028, 3054, 3058, and 3062.
Event Sched…

relatedRecords.name: #PerfMatters Conference
relatedRecords.description: A two-day community Web Performance conference happening March 31 & April 1, 2020 in Redwood City, CA. Workhops on March 30, 2020 to help get people up to speed on Web Performance. Hackathon on April 2, 2020 to improve online performance documentation.
